Name: EPS MONITORING
checklistText:
<size=21>SYSTEMS & MONITORING CHECKS
EPS monitoring check</size>
Cryogenic Pressure - Quantity Check
H2 PRESS (3) - 225-260 psia
O2 PRESS (3) - 865-935 psia
SURGE TK PRESS - 865-935 psia
CRYO FANS - OFF; ON as req'd

FC Power Plant Check
FC HTRS (3) - on(up)
FC RAD tb (3) - gray
FC REAC tb (3) - gray
FC IND sel - 1,2,3
	H2 FLOW - 0.03 - 0.15 lb/hr
	O2 FLOW - 0.25-1.2 lb/hr
	MOD SKIN TEMP - 390-440° F
	MOD COND EXH TEMP - 150-175° F
	FC pH HI tb - gray
	FC RAD TEMO L0 tb - gray

D-C Voltage-Ampere Check
MN BUS TIE (2) - OFF (verify)
FC MNA tb - 1 & 2 gray, 3 bp
FC MNB rb - 1 & 2 bp, 3 gray
FC 1,2, & 3 (check amps)
MAIN BUS A, B - 26.5-31 vdc
BAT BUS A, B, & BAT C - 31.5-38 vdc
PYRO BAT A, B - 36.5-37.5 vdc
DC IND sel - MNB
SYS TEST 5B - BAT RLY BUS - 3.4-4.1 vdc
A-C VOLTS - 113 to 117 all phases
